SummaryEnglish: With his straw hat and ragtag crew, young pirate Monkey D. Luffy goes on an epic voyage for treasure in this live-action adaptation of the popular manga.
Aliases: ONE PIECE INTO THE GRAND LINE

10.TitleEnglish: Cobra Kai's Jacob Bertrand Visits the Set of ONE PIECE
10.SummaryEnglish: When the worlds of ‘Cobra Kai’ and ‘One Piece’ collide, you know you’re in for a good time. Such was the case when superfan Jacob Bertrand, known for his role as Hawk in ‘Cobra Kai,’ surprised the cast of ‘One Piece’ in South Africa.

11.TitleEnglish: Iñaki Godoy Meets the One Piece Creators
11.SummaryEnglish: One Piece star Iñaki Godoy (Monkey D. Luffy) tours the offices of Shueisha Games, publishers of Oda Sensei's manga and creators of the original anime series. Iñaki views storyboards for the One Piece anime pilot and shares how much the manga means to him.

13.TitleEnglish: A very special message from Eiichiro Oda
13.SummaryEnglish: NAKAMA!!! ????‍☠️???? It fills us with great joy to give you this message directly from Oda-Sensei

1.SummaryEnglish: Stranded on a sinking boat, carefree Luffy begins his journey in search of a pirate king's lost treasure. But first, he'll need a crew, a ship and a map.

2.TitleEnglish: THE MAN IN THE STRAW HAT
2.SummaryEnglish: After securing a map to the Grand Line, Luffy, Nami and Zoro are taken hostage by a no-nonsense clown. New cadet Koby is cornered by Vice-Admiral Garp.

3.SummaryEnglish: In need of a proper ship, the gang reaches Syrup Village and meets the cheerful Usopp and his best friend Kaya. A sinister threat disrupts their plans.

4.SummaryEnglish: With his friends in danger and Klahadore's plan in motion, Usopp seeks help from the Marines. Blades clash when a fierce battle erupts at Kaya's mansion.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hat Pirates face their first adversary as a group. At a floating fish house, Luffy befriends a cook, and Zoro enters a duel with a warlord.

6.TitleEnglish: THE CHEF AND THE CHORE BOY
6.SummaryEnglish: Sanji and head chef Zeff put their differences aside to save a severely wounded Zoro. A ruthless Fishman on a mission stirs up trouble for the crew.

7.TitleEnglish: THE GIRL WITH THE SAWFISH TATTOO
7.SummaryEnglish: After striking a deal with a familiar foe to find Arlong, Luffy and his friends set sail for Coco Village and learn about Nami's mysterious past.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hat crew strives to take down Arlong and the Fishmen once and for all. After a tense family reunion, Luffy inches closer to his dreams.

2.TitleEnglish: ONE PIECE INTO THE GRAND LINE
